Flavours.name: Classic Vanilla
Flavours.desc: Indulge in the timeless classic - smooth and creamy vanilla ice cream.

Flavours.name: Decadent Chocolate
Flavours.desc: Rich and velvety chocolate ice cream for the ultimate chocolate lover.

Flavours.name: Scrumptious Strawberry
Flavours.desc: Fresh and fruity strawberry ice cream bursting with flavor.

Flavours.name: Minty Fresh
Flavours.desc: Cool and refreshing mint ice cream with real mint leaves.

Flavours.name: Creamy Coffee
Flavours.desc: Smooth and creamy coffee ice cream made with premium coffee beans.

Flavours.name: Bailey's
Flavours.desc: One of Happy Sun Ice Cream Shop's most popular flavors is Baileys Ice Cream. This ice cream is Irish cream flavored and loaded with Maraschino cherries and chocolate chips. Our Baileys Ice Cream satisfies even the pickiest of palates.

Flavours.name: Cr√®me Br√ªl√©e
Flavours.desc: There's nothing more satisfying than cracking through a cr√®me brul√©e's crispy, caramelized top into a creamy custard base. Back again, this time in it's full-dairy version, this flavour features a vanilla bean and custard base, with pieces of caramelized sugar throughout to resemble the classic dessert!

Flavours.name: After Eight
Flavours.desc: The After Eights bring a subtle minty-cold and quite unique chewiness from the frozen mint fondant they contain. Although to ensure full 'mintyness', the ice cream still has a custard base that is flavoured with natural extract of peppermint too.

Flavours.name: Stracciatella
Flavours.desc: This process creates the shreds of chocolate that give stracciatella its name, the word meaning 'little shred' in Italian. While stracciatella ice cream traditionally involves milk ice cream and milk chocolate, modern variations can also be made with vanilla and dark chocolate.

Flavours.name: Vegan...(error)
Flavours.desc: The stevia-sweetened vegan ice creams are nothing less than perfection.

Flavours.name: üé©Caramel Swirl
Flavours.desc: Experience the rich and buttery taste of caramel blended perfectly with smooth ice cream.

Flavours.name: Passion Fruit Sorbet
Flavours.desc: Prepare to be dazzled by the intense and exotic taste of passionfruit, as each spoonful of this sorbet bursts with a symphony of vibrant flavours. The sorbet's velvety texture glides smoothly across your palate, while the tropical tang dances on your taste buds, creating a harmonious and refreshing experience.

Flavours.name: Bubble Gum
Flavours.desc: Ice Cream. The Bubble Gum flavour is a nice balance of sweet and fruity that will be a sure hit with the young and the young at heart. Add a dash of rainbow sprinkles for a merry colourful dessert!

Flavours.name: Strawberry Sorbet
Flavours.desc: Light, fresh and full of fruit, this mouthwatering sorbet captures the taste of summer in a scoop. Bursting with berries and no added sugar for a delightful treat that's full of flavor, with zero fat, dairy or gluten!

Flavours.name: Dark Chocolate Sorbet
Flavours.desc: It's packed with so much real chocolate‚Äîthe most possible, in fact, to still legally call it ice cream‚Äîthat it is overflowing with rich, bittersweet chocolate flavor, and is dense but still creamy, like the inside of a dark chocolate truffle.

Flavours.name: Belgian Chocolate
Flavours.desc: Made with the finest Belgian chocolate, this luxurious ice cream is a true indulgence for chocolate lovers. Each spoonful offers a velvety smooth texture and an intense, decadent chocolate flavor that will take your taste buds on a journey to chocolate heaven.

Flavours.name: üé©Matcha Green Tea
Flavours.desc: Enjoy the unique and refreshing taste of matcha green tea in every scoop.

Flavours.name: Vanila Madagascar
Flavours.desc: This has an intense and sweet vanilla bean type flavour The Premium Range of Oil Soluble Flavours are designed and developed to give a flavour profile, which is similar to the actual product.

Flavours.name: Salted Butter Caramel
Flavours.desc: This ice cream flavor is complex in every sense. Caramel alone can often be overpowering or overly sweet, but course sea salt subdues it. You certainly taste the saltiness, and yet you still get that intense aged sweetness too.

Flavours.name: Great Cherry
Flavours.desc: Flavor is like a sweeter black cherry with a hint of tartness, which reminded me of almost of a cherry soda flavor without tasting too fake or like cough syrup.

Flavours.name: Sicily Pistachio
Flavours.desc: Velvety, with an intense taste and aroma: Aledi's Bronte DOP Green Pistachio cream has the highest concentration of Sicilian dried fruit. Made with a particular recipe that makes it very fine on the palate, but above all with excellent raw materials in high concentration.

Flavours.name: Praline Almond
Flavours.desc: a sweet, creamy and nutty confection that tastes like caramelized nuts with a soft, fudgy texture.

Flavours.name: Roasted Hazelnut
Flavours.desc: Incredibly delicious! A totally addictive praline taste for young and oldest gourmets. The specific and intense flavor of roasted hazelnuts combined with the delicacy of milk make this cream so different and original.

Flavours.name: Yogurt with Wild Strawberry
Flavours.desc: Sweet is one of the five main tastes. It has smooth and round notes

Flavours.name: Bear Tiramisu
Flavours.desc: A very airy, tender dessert with an amazing contrast of sweet ice cream and slightly bitter taste of the ice cream filling is complemented by velvet topping.

Flavours.name: Costa Da Caparica
Flavours.desc: (error)

Flavours.name: ü•öLemon Cheescake
Flavours.desc: A rich and creamy flavor with a slightly tangy and sweet taste.

Flavours.name: Vanila Madagascar
Flavours.desc: This has an intense and sweet vanilla bean type flavour The Premium Range of Oil Soluble Flavours are designed and developed to give a flavour profile, which is similar to the actual product.

Flavours.name: Red Velvet Delight
Flavours.desc: Indulge in the luxurious flavor of red velvet with creamy swirls of vanilla and chocolate.

Flavours.name: Toasted Coconut
Flavours.desc: Subtly sweet coconut ice cream packed with chocolate-dusted coconut shreds. An ode to the toasted coconut donut hole. Your crunch is like no other, your sweet taste is‚Ä¶ awesome.

Flavours.name: Red Velvet Delight
Flavours.desc: Indulge in the luxurious flavor of red velvet with creamy swirls of vanilla and chocolate.

Flavours.name: Caramel Swirl
Flavours.desc: Experience the rich and buttery taste of caramel blended perfectly with smooth ice cream.

Toppings.name: Sprinkles
Toppings.desc: Add colorful sprinkles to your ice cream for extra fun!

Toppings.name: Nuts
Toppings.desc: Crunchy nuts add a delightful texture to your ice cream.

Toppings.name: Fruit
Toppings.desc: Enjoy the freshness of seasonal fruits as a topping for your ice cream.

Toppings.name: Chocolate Chips
Toppings.desc: Satisfy your chocolate craving with delicious chocolate chips.

Toppings.name: Whipped Cream
Toppings.desc: Top off your ice cream with a dollop of fluffy whipped cream.

Specials.name: Chocolate Chip Sandwich
Specials.desc: Delicious chocolate chip cookies filled with creamy vanilla ice cream.

Specials.name: Double Fudge Sandwich
Specials.desc: Rich fudge brownies sandwiching smooth chocolate ice cream.

Specials.name: Oatmeal Raisin Sandwich
Specials.desc: Chewy oatmeal raisin cookies paired with cinnamon ice cream.

Specials.name: Banana Split
Specials.desc: A classic banana split with scoops of vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry ice cream, topped with whipped cream and cherries.

Specials.name: Brownie Sundae
Specials.desc: Warm brownie topped with vanilla ice cream, hot fudge, and nuts.

Specials.name: Caramel Apple Sundae

Specials.name: Mint Chocolate Chip Cake
Specials.desc: Refreshing mint chocolate chip ice cream with layers of chocolate cake.

Specials.name: üçæChocolate Martini
Specials.desc: Drizzle chocolate syrup inside the martini glasses then add chocolate syrup to a shallow plate and coat the rims of the glasses. Combine Baileys, chocolate liqueur, and vodka in a cocktail shaker filled with about a cup of Ice. Shake until thoroughly chilled. Strain drink into prepared glasses.
